actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the employers' credit against minimum wage liability which is based on tips received by employees.

summary.text: Repeals the employees' credit under the Fair Labor Standards Act against minimum wage liability which is based on tips received by employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the employers' credit against minimum wage liability which is based on tips received by employees.
